Description.Text: Spa & Kur Hotel Harvey is a modern 4-star hotel offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Frantiskovy Lazne. Highlights include a prestigious spa, international restaurant and an excellent location next to Westend Park. The city centre is historically renowned as a spa town and leisure trips date back to the 15th-century. Nearby places of interest include Westend Park and the city's 12 operational mineral springs. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Frantiskovy Lazne destinations. The hotel is housed in a neo-classical mid-rise building. Facilities include a spa and wellness centre which encompasses an indoor swimming pool, Jacuzzis and private treatment rooms. A range of beauty, massage and medical treatments are available on request. Standard rooms are decorated in a traditional style with neutral colours and light wood furniture. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, tea and coffee equipment and chargeable Wi-Fi. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. The restaurant offers local and international cuisine and has an adjoining terrace. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the restaurant bar and the wellness bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Chargeable parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
